rooms.description: Spacious living area with large glass doors opening to the garden for natural light and ventilation, designed in a Bohemian style with vibrant colors and vintage decor.
Open-plan dining area integrated with the living room, featuring Bohemian-style seating and decorative accents.

Modern yet rustic kitchen designed for efficient natural ventilation with a dedicated exhaust system; includes ample storage following local building norms and Vastu principles by aligning north-west direction.
Spacious bedroom with a balcony ensuring natural light, decorated in Bohemian aesthetics, Vastu aligned in the northeast direction to promote wealth and energy.
Bohemian styled bedroom featuring a balcony for additional natural light and ventilation; positioned to maintain privacy while ensuring airflow.
Additional bedroom designed in Bohemian style with a balcony for natural light, integrated seamlessly into the layout to ensure a balanced energy flow per Vastu principles.
Shared bathroom facility designed with modern fixtures and natural ventilation; placement adheres to local building norms.
Exclusive balcony for master bedroom providing ample sunlight, designed in a Bohemian style with decorative elements.
Balcony for Bedroom 2 ensuring natural ventilation and light, integrating seamlessly with the room's Bohemian decor.
Balcony for Bedroom 3 ensuring ample sunlight and ventilation, designed in a Bohemian style with minimalistic elements.

openings.description: Grand entrance door aligned with the south-east direction as per Vastu principles, providing a welcoming entry and natural light.
Large window opening to the expansive garden area for enhanced natural ventilation and scenic views.
Secure door leading to the swimming pool area integrated with the garden design.
Open balcony door for master bedroom ensuring unobstructed access and natural light.

design_details.vastu_alignment: Rooms aligned with north-east for wealth and master bedroom, while kitchen oriented to north-west. Living areas designed to maximize natural light.

garden_details.description: Expansive garden area integrated with the home design, featuring natural landscaping and space for a swimming pool.

swimming_pool.description: Modern swimming pool designed to complement the Bohemian aesthetics while providing relaxation and enhancing property value.
